name: Escape Rooms (tri/KUMA, wilsonni, Wolfleader101)
description:
This is an escape style game with multiple different themed levels to select from.This is a submission for My First Game Jam: Summer 2021.

Current Themes:

  • Science Lab
  • Prison

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact with buttons and grab holdable items.
  • Q + R - Rotate holdable items.
  • Scroll - Adjust hold distance of holdable items.
  • Tab - Return to theme select room.
  • Escape - Quit the game.
